# Enumeration: CoinType

BIP44 Coin Types for IOTA and Shimmer.

- [IOTA](CoinType.md#iota)
- [Shimmer](CoinType.md#shimmer)

## Enumeration Members

### IOTA

• **IOTA** = ``4218``

The IOTA coin.

___

### Shimmer

• **Shimmer** = ``4219``

The Shimmer coin.

___

### Ether

• **Ether** = ``60``

The Ether coin.
